text: Argis is a commune. It is in the Auvergne-Rhône-Alpes region of the Ain department; in the east of France. In 2009, 421 people lived in the commune. The inhabitants are the Argissiens. In the Middle Ages there was a castle in Argis; but it does not exist anymore. There are also two cascades in the commune, the cascade de la côte and the cascade de la Pissoire. Category:Communes in Ain
title: Argis
